result.title: CF is BEST
result.content:
• Standard Problemset
  • Problems setters are Top Rated Contestants
  • Regular Contests helps you to be an active programmer
  • Unlike UVA or other Judge, you dont want to solve as many problem as you can.Rather you try to develop your skill as much as you can.In this the rating system plays a vital role
  • When you get minus rating you can try to upsolve different problems , so that in next contest you can participate with a better skillset
  • Regular Contests are more competitive than other Judge
  • Editorials System
  • Submission View System.Through it you can see how other solve a problem and learn that technique
